items.sentence: I don't think it's smart for you to do that.
I understand that you've started doing that.
I thought you were interested in doing that.
I thought you said you'd stopped doing that.
I thought you said you regretted doing that.
I thought you didn't to know how to do that.
I thought perhaps more people would do that.
I thought I'd be through doing that by 2:30.
I thought I might not be allowed to do that.
I think it's probably impossible to do that.
I think it wouldn't be dangerous to do that.
I think doing that would be too hard for me.
Weren't you supposed to do that before 2:30?
This evening is the only time I can do that.
The reason I came here today was to do that.
Please make sure that you do that every day.
My parents would never permit me to do that.
It's been three years since I last did that.
It'll take me a good three hours to do that.
It would be very insensitive to do that now.
It would be possible to do that by yourself.
It won't be easy to find someone to do that.
It should be interesting for you to do that.
It probably won't be interesting to do that.
I've never had the chance to try doing that.
I'm not sure if I can do that, but I'll try.
I'm not going to do that if I don't have to.
I'm glad I'm not the one who has to do that.
Tom is the only person here who can do that.
I wasn't the only one who wanted to do that.
I wasn't the first one to decide to do that.
I wasn't convinced that I needed to do that.
I wasn't able to do that until I was thirty.
I wasn't able to do that because I was sick.
I want to know when you're going to do that.
I didn't think Tom really needed to do that.
I didn't realize that Tom wanted to do that.
I didn't know when Tom was going to do that.
I didn't do that because Tom told me not to.
How many times will Tom to do that tomorrow?
How many seconds did it take Tom to do that?
How many months will it take Tom to do that?
I don't think that Tom will like this place.
Apparently Tom's father is into photography.
I think that Tom is a little too optimistic.
I spent all the money I had to buy the book.
I've got really bad reception at the moment.
Tom told me that his mother never loved him.
Rice prices are regulated by the government.
Turn off the lights when you leave the room.
Do you know where Tom is going to eat lunch?
I told Tom that I'd help him move his piano.
Have you decided what you'll do next summer?
Are you sure you don't want to come with me?
There are many senior citizens in this area.
I'll be leaving as soon as this job is done.
I wish that you wouldn't make so much noise.
I won't be able to solve this problem alone.
I complained about that, but it didn't help.
That's exactly why I can't take you with me.
You may ride my bicycle anytime you want to.
You may borrow my bicycle whenever you want.
I can't really see anything from where I am.
What did you do the last time you were here?
Have you made a list of everything you need?
I wouldn't be surprised if it snows tonight.
Tom wasn't surprised that Mary won the race.
This is the first time I've ever tried this.
I pretended that I didn't hear the question.
I have absolutely no idea where I should go.
I was told that I should stay away from Tom.
The only person here that Tom knows is Mary.
I heard that you went to see Tom last night.
Why didn't you tell me that belonged to Tom?
Are you really going to do that by yourself?
We thought you'd been captured by the enemy.
Tom won't be able to finish that in an hour.
A prophet is not recognized in his own land.
Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery.
Old soldiers never die. They just fade away.
Do you have a toilet plunger I could borrow?
We should get out of here as fast as we can.
The question now is what should we be doing.
We're not going to just sit all day, are we?
Maybe we can sit at a table near the window.
A little knowledge can be a dangerous thing.
I'm more optimistic about our prospects now.
I wouldn't be that optimistic if I were you.
Tom told me to make sure that Mary was safe.
We've been playing music together for years.
We've been working together for a long time.
We're going to do everything we can to help.
We have a lot of things we need to do today.
We weren't sure about what you wanted to do.
We've got much bigger problems to deal with.
This is the biggest party I've ever been to.
This problem is much bigger than we thought.
This is the big break I've been waiting for.
Are you sure you don't have anything bigger?
It's much bigger than I thought it would be.
